snippet: Residents of Cholula, Mexico, known for its wealth of old churches, have organized patrols in response to the theft of religious art and the lack of official response.
abstract: Cholula Journal; citizens of Cholula, Mexico, have taken to guarding city's many old churches at night to ward off thieves intent on stealing religious art; city's officials have proved under-equipped and unresponsive to thefts.
lead_paragraph: Residents of Cholula, Mexico, known for its wealth of old churches, have organized patrols in response to the theft of religious art and the lack of official response.

headline.seo: Looting of Cholula Churches Stirs Locals to Action
headline.main: Fighting Back as Mexican Churches Are Looted
headline.print_headline: Fighting Back as Mexican Churches Are Looted
